name: Topdown Fury 2
description:
Topdown Fury 2 is a refreshed version of the first game built from the ground up using a different engine. It features new encounters, refreshed gameplay, realistic effects and much, much more.

What's new

Topdown Fury 2 is based off hit games like enter the gungeon and mixes elements from the original game into a sleek, improved hybrid.

Links:

Topdown Fury Classic: https://mini-official.itch.io/topdown-fury
